S.FORM: lawkah simu kwara ga.pata'aring ta la.
tuli' tubun tunux!
lawkah su pasaba' biru.
tala'ung.
lawkah simu kwara ga. sawni ga pasaba'ay simu ni pasaba biru sawun nanu kamayan lalu Tayan ku mutu ta nani'un hiya.
S.TRANSL: 大家好。今天老師要教大家食物的泰雅語怎麼說。
Hello everyone. Today I am going to teach you how to say food in Thai.

S.FORM: ba'un su mung kayi pasaba biru ga?
S.TRANSL: Do you understand what the teacher says?

S.FORM: pasaba biru, ini mu ba'iy mung. kayan lawziy aw?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我不懂。可以再說一次嗎?
I don’t understand. Can you repeat it again?

S.FORM: ini mu pungi. musa balayi kahanayang tikay aw?
S.TRANSL: 我聽不到，可以大聲一點嗎?
I can’t hear you, can you speak louder?

S.FORM: katayux ti hani! galu kung lamapu lawziy.
S.TRANSL: 請看這裡! 跟著我唸一遍。
Look here, please! Repeat after me.

S.FORM: balayi balay lnpu mamu ki.
lapagaw ta lawziy. karahu tikay hanayang mamu.
S.TRANSL: Read it again. Please speak louder.

S.FORM: yamalux tikay. ka sanguwa.
agan ku biru mamu.
awu, pasaba biru.
agan ku inpit mamu.
pasaba biru, yamangiya kung maras inpit la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: agan ku i'ing mamu.
pasaba biru, yamangiya kung maras i'ing la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my eraser.

S.FORM: kasiyuk i'ing ki bih su gamalu miru.
S.TRANSL: 請跟旁邊同學借橡皮擦。
Please borrow erasers from your classmates.

S.FORM: kasiyuki kung i'ing aw?
pahangi ta la.
masi runi ku pinkaba'an ta la, pakatayux ta suru na pahangi'an lawziy.
S.TRANSL: 我們就上到這邊，下週再見。
Class dismissed, see you next week.

S.FORM: ima su?
kuzing ga Tali Suyang.
ima su?
kuzing ga la'i ni Suyan Pawan, Tali Suyan lalu mu.
S.TRANSL: I am Suyan’s son, my name is Tali.

S.FORM: ima su?
kuzing ga makabaga biru ni Yupas, lalu mu ga Tali.
S.TRANSL: I am a student of Yupas, my name is Tali.

S.FORM: nanu ku lalu su?
lalu mu ga Tali Pawan.
ima lalu ni yaba su?
lalu ni yaba mu ga Pawan Kaynu.
S.TRANSL: My dad’s name is Pawan Kaynu.

S.FORM: ima ku hiya?
hiya ga Tuyaw Piling.
hiya ga basuyan mu tamalung, lalu niya ga Pasang.
S.TRANSL: He is my brother, his name is Pasang.

S.FORM: ima lalu niya ?
lalu niya ga Yumin Tali.
lalu niya ga Yumin Tali pi?
hu' lalu niya ga Yumin Tali.
S.TRANSL: 是，他的名字是 Yumin Tali.。
Yes, his name is Yumin Tali.

S.FORM: lalu niya ga Tali Nawpas pi?
'yat, lalu niya ga Yumin Tali.
S.TRANSL: No, his name is Yumin Tali.

S.FORM: ima ku hasa hiya?
hiya ga Puyap. yata mu ku hiya.
ima ku hasa?
hiya ga wagi mu, lalu niya ga Amuy.
S.TRANSL: 她是我的朋友，她的名字是Amuy。
She’s my friend, her name is Amuy.

S.FORM: pisa kayan su la?
mapu kayan mu la.
pisa kayan niya?
mapu sazing kayan niya la.
maziman kayan ni yaba mu la?
maziman kayan ni yaba mu su kayan hani?
pisa ku matasaway su?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: kiyan sazing ku basuyan tamalung ki basuyan kanayrin, ru utux ku saway tamalung ki saway kanayrin.
S.TRANSL: 我有兩個兄姐，一個弟妹。
I have two brothers and sisters and one younger brother and sister.

S.FORM: kiya basuyan su tamalung?
ungat basuyan mu tamalung.
pisa' hi sali su?
S.TRANSL: How many people are in your family?

S.FORM: pisa hi kwara sali su?
S.TRANSL: How many people are in your family?

S.FORM: payat hi kwara ku utux sali mu.
S.TRANSL: There are four of us in our family.

S.FORM: niyan su miru inu?
niyan kung miru i Bariy.
ima ku hiya?
hiya ga mama mu.
nanu ku ki patawawan ni mama su?
S.TRANSL: 你的舅舅從事什麼工作?
What does your uncle do for a living?

S.FORM: hiya ga Kinsat.
ima ku hasa hiya?
hiya ga basuyan mu kanayrin.
kiyan patawawan ni basuyan su kanayrin?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister have a job?

S.FORM: ki ma'umah yayuwaw na kuysang hiya.
sazing hi hasa ga matasaway aw?
S.TRANSL: 他們兩個人是兄弟姐妹嗎?

S.FORM: ayat, laha ga masarawin.
Yenzyumin su aw?
hu ga, kuzing ga Atayan ki.
kanayrin su ga Yenzyumin aw?
hu, sikila hiya ga Bunun.
babawi yaba su pi?
hu, babawi sami kwara utux sali.
S.TRANSL: Yes, we are all very tall.

S.FORM: niya miru laku saway su kanayrin la?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister go to school?

S.FORM: hu, niya miru la.
ba kamayan kayi Tayan ku saway su tamalung ru kanayrin aw?
S.TRANSL: Do your siblings speak the language?

S.FORM: hu, ba kamayan kayi Tayan laha.
S.TRANSL: Yes, they speak the ethnic language.

S.FORM: pisa kwara ku matasway su?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: tugan hi ku matasaway mu.
S.TRANSL: I have three brothers and sisters.

S.FORM: magalu su maki ki yaba ru yaya aw?
S.TRANSL: 你和爸爸媽媽一起住嗎?
Do you live with your parents?

S.FORM: hu, niyan ku magalu maki ki yaba ru yaya mu.
S.TRANSL: 是，我和爸爸媽媽一起住。
Yes, I live with my mom and dad.

S.FORM: magalu su maki ki yutas ru yaki aw?
S.TRANSL: 你和爺爺奶奶一起住嗎?
Do you live with your grandparents?

S.FORM: ini yu, ini kuzing pagalu maki ki yutas ru yaki mu.
S.TRANSL: 不，我沒和跟他們一起住。
No, I didn’t live with them.

S.FORM: niyan su magalu maki ki ima?
niya kuzing magalu maki ki yaba，yaya ru basuyan mu tamalung.
S.TRANSL: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥住在一起。
I live with my father, mother and brother.

S.FORM: minkahun su inu?
minkahun kuzing i Bariy.
niyan maki inu ku sali mamu?
ki maki i Bariy ku sali miyan.
niyan inu ku alang su?
niyan maki i Liyung Paynux ku alang mu.
S.TRANSL: 我的故鄉在泰雅北勢群。
My hometown is in the northern region of Athens.

S.FORM: niyan maki inu ku alang mamu?
niyan maki i Maybanan ku alang miyan.
S.TRANSL: 我們的部落在永安部落。

S.FORM: kanuwan ga mutu su musa alang?
S.TRANSL: 你什麼時候會回去部落?
When are you going back to the tribe?

S.FORM: mahangi luyux i Abangan ga mutu kung musa i alang.
S.TRANSL: I will go back in the summer.

S.FORM: kuzing ga la'i na Atayan.
maha nanu ku kayan sawni?
mahatu witux la,makilux balay kayan la.
S.TRANSL: The sun is coming out, it's very hot.

S.FORM: masakinut ti tanux aw?
S.TRANSL: Is it going to be cold outside?

S.FORM: sakinut ki, kapayux malukus su latan yu.
S.TRANSL: It's cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: makilux ti tanux aw?
ini yu, masabayhuy la, tala'atu balay ki.
pakasa nanu ku kayan sawni?
ayat pasakinut ru ayat pakilux uziy, balayi balay.
S.TRANSL: 今天不冷也不熱，很舒服。
It's neither cold nor hot today, very comfortable.

S.FORM: pakusa nanu ku kayan malahangan sawni?
ungat yulung babaw kayan, mahatu ku yangah la.
S.TRANSL: 天空沒有雲，星星出來了。
There were no clouds in the sky; the stars came out.

S.FORM: maha nanu ku kayan ti tanux?
nisan masiwat ku walax, niyan witux ru mahatu hawngu liyutux uziy la.
S.TRANSL: 雨剛剛停，出了太陽，彩虹出來了。
The rain has just stopped, the sun has come out, the rainbow is coming out.

S.FORM: maha nanu ku kayan su kiya hiya?
rahu ku bayhuy miyan runi hiya.
S.TRANSL: We're going to have a big storm here.

S.FORM: Balayi ku kayan su kiya hiya?
hu' yu, mahatu su rahu waitux.ay.
S.TRANSL: Very well, out of the big sun.

S.FORM: musa kung miru la.
S.TRANSL: I have to go to school.

S.FORM: masakinut ku kayan, kapayux hazi' malukus latan.
S.TRANSL: The weather is very cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: musa kung tanux la.
na tikay han pawalax kisa la, laxiy yangay maras su tabakuy ki.
S.TRANSL: 等一下會下大雨，你要記得帶傘。
It's going to rain heavily, you have to remember to bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: musa mawalax pi?
nisan sababu bisu ki, musa mawalax kisa yu!!
S.TRANSL: 剛剛打雷了，等一下應該就會下雨。
There was thunder just now, and it's supposed to rain later.

S.FORM: mawalax la?
minwalax sawni, hani laga masiwat walax la.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛有下雨，現在雨停了。
It just rained, and now it's stopped.

S.FORM: mawalax la ?
asi ga minwalax la yu,mahuzi ku tu'iy ki.
S.TRANSL: 好像下過雨了，馬路是濕的。
It seems to have rained and the road is wet.

S.FORM: niya mawaax pi? huwaka ka mahuzi kwara' ku hi su?
S.TRANSL: 有下雨嗎?你怎麼全身都濕了?
Is it raining? Why are you all wet?

S.FORM: ki mawalax tanux, ini kuzing aras su tabakuy.
S.TRANSL: 外面在下雨，我沒有帶雨傘。
It's raining outside, so I didn't bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: lawkah su na ga?
tiya kinrahu ku bayhuy, maymaw maxayan tunux mu ka sinbahuyan niya.
S.TRANSL: The wind is blowing so hard that my head hurts.

S.FORM: lawkah su na ga?
tiya kinrahu ku witux, maymaw matyabus tunux ka sinbuwan niya.
S.TRANSL: 太陽好大，曬得我頭好暈。
The sun is so big, it makes me dizzy.

S.FORM: yamngiya kung maras su babiru' la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: kasyukay misu.
yamangiya kung maras su uway la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my chopsticks.

S.FORM: ini kung aras uziy,halay ta mabaziy.
S.TRANSL: I don't have one either, let's go buy one.

S.FORM: hata mabaziy su inpit aw?
S.TRANSL: Can we go buy a pen?

S.FORM: aw,pabaziy kung lawziy i'ing na.
S.TRANSL: Well, I still have to buy erasers.

S.FORM: hata mabaziy su ni'un kanama aw?
S.TRANSL: Let's go get breakfast, shall we?

S.FORM: laxan mu, manani kuzing sali la.
S.TRANSL: No, I've already eaten at home.

S.FORM: yangan mu i pasakilux ku sabili la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to steam my lunchbox.

S.FORM: hazi hali pasakilux ru!
yamngiya kung maras su sabili' la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my lunchbox.

S.FORM: nanu u pagalagaw ta mani ku sabili mu la.
S.TRANSL: 那我們一起吃我的便當吧!
Then let's eat my lunch box together!

S.FORM: nanu ku ni'un su aliyan la?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: pakani kung su kryaxan na pakaba'an biru.
S.TRANSL: 我要吃學校的營養午餐。
I want a nutritious school lunch.

S.FORM: nanu ku ni'un su aliyan la?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: niya kuzing maras su sabili sawni,pagalawgaw ta mani aliyan ki!
S.TRANSL: 我今天有帶便當，我們中午一起吃吧!
I've brought a lunchbox today, let's eat together at noon!

S.FORM: hata i tamapak mari lating aw?
S.TRANSL: Let's go play basketball, shall we?

S.FORM: aw ru! hata la.
hata i tamapak mari yakiyu aw?
laxan mu, patayux kung su biru'.
ragiy kung musa magan kagaw.
S.TRANSL: Please help me with the broom.

S.FORM: awu, bi'ay misu kagaw hani .
S.TRANSL: Okay, here's a broomstick for you.

S.FORM: ragi kung magan su i'ing gali aw?
S.TRANSL: Can you help me with the cloth?

S.FORM: niya kung kamagaw, tuy iy tu Kacaw ramaw isu magan.
S.TRANSL: I'm sweeping the floor, you ask Kacaw to help you.

S.FORM: kamasu' su kamagaw la?
su'un mu kamagaw la.
huwa su ka ini kagaw?
kamasu' kung kamagaw la.
ma'uraw ku raxayan,haliy i ta'uwax tikay.
S.TRANSL: The floor is dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: awu,hala kung magan su gali' han.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll go get the cloth.

S.FORM: ma'uraw ku nyaway hasa,hali i ami'ing tikay.
S.TRANSL: 那個窗戶很髒，去擦一下。
That window is very dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: na' tikay han,ini mu masu'iy kamagaw hani na.
S.TRANSL: 等一下，我還沒掃完這裡。
Wait a minute, I'm not done sweeping here yet.

S.FORM: nanu ku patawawan su kisa la?
musa kung hamkani pasaba' biur.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to see my teacher.

S.FORM: kamasu su miru kisa laga, nanu yuwaw su la?
S.TRANSL: What do you do after school?

S.FORM: musa kung gmalu i rawin mu ma'uwas.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to sing with my friends.

S.FORM: kamasu miru hiya laga ,nanu ku yuwaw niya la?
musa i malangiya hiya la.
ma'ut kung niyan sali i Maya aw?
S.TRANSL: May I ask if Maya’ is home?

S.FORM: niyan sali hiya,uwah zik sali.
S.TRANSL: She’s at home, please come in.

S.FORM: ma'ut kung ni, niyan sali i Puyap aw?
ungat sali yu, kiya nanu ku yuwaw su?
S.TRANSL: 她不在，請問你有什麼事?
She’s not here, what can I do for you?

S.FORM: ima sa?
yutas, kuzing ga Maya', gyahiy tikay lihun.
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, I’m Maya’, please open the door.

S.FORM: ima su pi?
Puyap, kuzing ga Maya', muwah kung hamkani su manaw isu.
S.TRANSL: Puyap, I’m Maya’, I’ve come to play with you.

S.FORM: basiya ta ini pakatayux la.
hu ga! sanun misu la.hazi uwah matisan han!
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我很想念你。快來聊天吧!
Yeah! I miss you so much. Come on, let’s chat!

S.FORM: tala'ung, nabu tikay su saha han.
S.TRANSL: Please sit down and have some tea.

S.FORM: mahuway su!
nabu saha'.
tiya~ kinbalay balay bugun ku saha' mamu.
mani'ay ta su babuway ra'iri han!
aw! balayi balay taxan ku babuway ra'iri hani.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!這些水果看起來很棒。

S.FORM: balayi ni'un ku babuway ra'iri hani ?
hu yu,balayi balay ni'un ku babauway hanii.
kamasu pahapuy kabagi'an yaya la,hazi uwah mani laki!
S.TRANSL: 媽媽煮好晚餐了，快來吃吧!
Mom has cooked dinner, come and eat!

S.FORM: aw, hala kung mayma ba han.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I’ll go wash my hands.

S.FORM: kalawkah mani ki, bliy su sa'uli .
S.TRANSL: 盡量吃喝，你又不是外人。
Try to eat and drink as much as possible, you’re not an outsider.

S.FORM: payux wayan mu ni'un la, matangi la ki.
S.TRANSL: I ate a lot, I’m full.

S.FORM: kapayux hazi mani, laxiy i abaga yu.
aw, sahiya' balay ni'un.
pahari kung la ki, makataxay ta sautux la.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，下次再來看你。
I’m leaving, I’ll see you next time.

S.FORM: aw han, pakataxa ta lawziy.
malahangan la, musa kuzing sali la yu.
uwah macisan lawziy sa'utux yu!
tahuway la,pinbaga su hakayan su.
aw, kiyan la hari su ga, iri muwah matisan sali mu.
S.TRANSL: Okay, come to my house sometime.

S.FORM: lawkah simu kwara ga, rasun simu musa matisan su yayutas na alang ta riyax sawni.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去部落訪問耆老。
Hello everyone, today I’m taking you to the tribe to interview the elders.

S.FORM: aw yu! pakayan sami kayi Atayan ki yutas miyan.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!我們要跟耆老說泰雅語。

S.FORM: sawbih ta tayhuk la?
sawbih tayhuk la.
yutas, muwah sami matayux isu yu.
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, we’ve come to see you.

S.FORM: wa ! ba simu kamayan kayi ta Atayan ki! tiya kinbalay!
S.TRANSL: 你們會說泰雅語啊!真是太棒了!

S.FORM: lawkah simu kwara' ga,rasun simu pasaba'biru' musa ma'umah su mayah tarakis.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去小米田工作。
Hello everyone, today I will take you to work in the millet field.

S.FORM: aw, pasaba biru.
uwah babaku hani kwara,lalungi maras ku babingan su pa'umah ki.
S.TRANSL: 大家過來排隊，記得帶好工具。
Come and line up, remember to bring your tools.

S.FORM: uwah mabaku hani kwara, langlung maras ku babingun su patayuwaw mamu ki.
S.TRANSL: 大家過來排隊，記得帶好工具。
Come and line up, remember to bring your tools.

S.FORM: aw, pasaba biru, niya sami malas su babingan pa'umah la.
S.TRANSL: 是的，老師，我們都拿好工具了。
Yes, sir, we’ve got our tools.

S.FORM: tayhuk ta la?
ini tayhuk na, tuwahi na yu.
S.TRANSL: Not yet, it’s still far away.

S.FORM: usa' pasiya siya isu.
aw, halay mu pasiya siya.
usa' i magan su kuku isu.
S.TRANSL: You go get the bird catcher.

S.FORM: awu, hala kung kamuku.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I’ll go and catch the birds.

S.FORM: lawkah simu kwara' ga, riyax swani ga musa ta i libu' na sinanan.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，我們今天要去動物園。
Hello everyone, we are going to the zoo today.

S.FORM: tiya kinbalayi yu! pakusa ta nanu musa kiya?
S.TRANSL: 好棒喔!我們要怎麼去呢?
Awesome! How are we going to get there?

S.FORM: pgalu ta su galagan kulu bas.
inlay pabaku kwara mamu, nama ta mabaziy su kipu han.
S.TRANSL: 大家排好隊，我們準備買票。
Everyone line up, we are ready to buy tickets.

S.FORM: aw.
ti galayng hani ga libu kabahani,ti suru hiya ga sali u',katayux kiya nanak ki .
S.TRANSL: 前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，大家自己參觀。
There are birds in the front and snakes in the back.

S.FORM: pasaba'biru mutu kung mangungu u'.
nay'iri, nan usa matayux kabahani isu.
S.TRANSL: It doesn’t matter, then you go and watch the birds.

S.FORM: utux pasapangan witux la ga,waha ta masatana runi ki .
S.TRANSL: 我們一個小時後回來集合。
We’ll be back in an hour.

S.FORM: aw, mahuway su pasaba biru.
nanu ku wayan su taxan sawni?
wayan mu taxan la ku payux na u',ru payux na kabahani.
S.TRANSL: 我看到了好多蛇，還有好多鳥。
I saw a lot of snakes and a lot of birds.

S.FORM: hazi tikay,musa ta la.
S.TRANSL: Hurry up, we have to go.

S.FORM: na kung tikay,mabaytux ku kuzih mu la.
S.TRANSL: Wait for me, my feet are tired.

S.FORM: hala ta maglu malangiiya aw?
aw! tila la!
habayaw ku tayan niya malangiya runi.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of people swimming here.

S.FORM: yazik ku siya hasa hiya, asi ta palangiya runi ga asa la.
S.TRANSL: 那裡水很深，我們在這裡游泳就好。
The water is deep there, so we just swim here.

S.FORM: minnaha su nanu muwah?
hmnakay kung muwah ki.
nanu ku ginlagan su kulu?
S.TRANSL: What kind of car did you take?

S.FORM: ganalu kung su kulu bas muwah yu.
pananu su musa kyukay?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to church?

S.FORM: papiray taraku yaba mu panga kung niya.
mutu mahanunu musa baruwan karariya hiya?
S.TRANSL: How does he usually go to school?

S.FORM: mutu gamalu su tu'iy zik musa baruwan hiya.
S.TRANSL: He took the subway to school.

S.FORM: maha nanu musa mabaziy tabihi yaki su?
S.TRANSL: How does your grandmother go to the grocery store?

S.FORM: mutu miray su utubay hiya musa mabaziy tabihi.
S.TRANSL: She went to the grocery store on a motorcycle.

S.FORM: pakusa su nanu musa i Laniy?
S.TRANSL: How are you going to get to Orchid Island?

S.FORM: pagalu kung su asu musa i Laniy.
S.TRANSL: I want to take a boat to Lanyu.

S.FORM: pakusa nanu musa i Laniy hiya?
S.TRANSL: How did he get to Orchid Island?

S.FORM: pagalu su sakuki hiya musa i Laniy.
S.TRANSL: He took a plane to Orchid Island.

S.FORM: pagalu nanu taraku' musa i Takaw hiya?
S.TRANSL: What bus did he take to Kaohsiung?

S.FORM: pagalu su haylaw kisiya hiya musa i Takaw.
S.TRANSL: He took the THSR to Kaohsiung.

S.FORM: ganalu su kisya musa Taytung hiya pi?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: hu,ganalu su kisiya hiya musa i Taytung.
S.TRANSL: Yes, he took a train to Taitung.

S.FORM: ganalu su kisiya hiya musa i Taytung pi?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: ayat ki, ginalu su sakuki hiya musa i Taytugn.
S.TRANSL: No, he took a plane to Taitung.

S.FORM: kiyan ku nanan su galagan bas llingay runi aw?
S.TRANSL: Is there a bus stop near here?

S.FORM: kiyan ,pakura su galayng tikay la ga musa su taxan ku nanan na bas la.
S.TRANSL: 有，往前走就會看到公車站了。
Yes, if you go straight ahead, you will see the bus stop.

S.FORM: ki ti inu ku payang sawbih nanan su tu'iy zik runi?
S.TRANSL: 離這裡最近的捷運站在哪裡?
Where is the nearest MRT station?

S.FORM: ungat ku galagan na tu'iy zik runi hiya,musa nanak takusi ku ba'un su gamalu ki.
S.TRANSL: 這裡沒有捷運站，你只能坐計程車。
There is no MRT station here, you can only take a taxi.

S.FORM: gamalu su bas ga katuwa su kabasiya ga patayhuk i baruwan?
S.TRANSL: How long does it take to get to the school by bus?

S.FORM: mapu magan ara' pasapagan witux ga patayhuk i baruwan.
galalu su haylaw kisya ga katuwa' bsiya ga patayhuk i Tahaytun?
S.TRANSL: 搭高鐵要多久時間會到臺中?
How long does it take to get to Taichung by THSR?

S.FORM: utux pasapangan witux la ga patayhuk i Tahaytun la.
S.TRANSL: I will come to Taichung in an hour.

S.FORM: mutu basiya miray su turaku musa i Ulay aw?
S.TRANSL: Is it a long drive to Ulai?

S.FORM: kina su musa utux pasapangan witux.
musa katuwa basiya ku ganalu su tu'iy zik muwah sali mu?
S.TRANSL: 你搭捷運來我家要多久?
How long did it take you to come to my house by subway?

S.FORM: musa i mapusan ara' pasapangan witux.
ba su miray tilinsiya aw?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to ride a bicycle?

S.FORM: ba kung miray su tilinsya.
kiyan ku utubay su?
kiyan utux ku utubay mu.
kiyan ku utubay su?
ungat ku utubay mu.
pa'usay misu tikay aw?
aw, ya'asa ku lungan mu uziy.
pa'usay misu tikay aw?
laxiy, ungat sa'ayung ku ba'un mu.
S.TRANSL: Don't, I don't know much about it.

S.FORM: kiyan hari su i babaw kinryaxan? muwa na musa kung macisan isu aw?
S.TRANSL: 你下午有空嗎?我想去拜訪你可以嗎?
Are you free this afternoon? I'd like to visit you, is that okay?

S.FORM: awu, naw misu sali mu.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll wait for you at home.

S.FORM: kiyan hari su sasan aw? muwan na musa kung maut isu sawun sinpung kayi na Gaga Atayan su ralali.
S.TRANSL: 你明天有空嗎?我想請問你關於泰雅族的傳說故事。
Are you free tomorrow? I'd like to ask you about the legendary story of the [Atayal] tribe.

S.FORM: musa kuzing ragiyax sasan, ayat kung p'aki sali.
S.TRANSL: 明天我要去山上，不在家喔。
I'm going to the mountains tomorrow, so I won't be home.

S.FORM: payux ku ba'un su yayuwaw Gaga na Atayan sarali , muwa na pa'usay misu tikay aw.
S.TRANSL: 我聽說您對泰雅族的傳統習俗非常了解，想要請教您一下。
I heard that you know a lot about the traditional customs of the Atayal, so I would like to ask you a few questions.

S.FORM: ini kapayux ku bba'un mu ki, sikila talamaw mu su rangu samiyuk ku pana'ut su.
S.TRANSL: 我所了解的不多，但是我會盡量回答。
I don't know much about it, but I will try to answer as best I can.

S.FORM: ma'ut kung ga musa balayi i galan su limu raywan aw? kusa na naki i balayi sabiur layla.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄影嗎?這樣以後比較容易記錄。
Can I record the video? It will be easier to record in the future.

S.FORM: aw, ungat ya'ih niya.
pa'usay misu tikay pisa ku kayan su la?
rayma wayan su ma'isu pagan masapat kayan mu la.
payang su la'i na ki.
ini la ki',rayma kung yutas la.
pa'usay misu tikay minkahun su inu?
nakahung kung ti gi alang Mabanan.
pa'usay misu tikay Atayan uziy kanayrin su ga?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的太太也是泰雅族人嗎?

S.FORM: ayat yu, hiya ga tayan alang na Puyuma.
ba su kamayan kayi ni nanu?
ba kung kamayan kayi na Atayan sqliq ru kayi Atayan sa'uli.
S.TRANSL: 我會說賽考利克泰雅語和澤敖利泰雅語。
I speak [Sykoriak Atayal] and [Zed Oli Atayal].

S.FORM: pa'asunku riyax sawni ka ba kung macisan ki isu la, kayan cikay ku sawun na Gaga aliyap aw?
S.TRANSL: 今天很高興能訪問您，請您談一下，有關狩獵的禁忌好嗎?
It's a pleasure to interview you today, can you talk about the taboo of hunting?

S.FORM: aw, mutu kung lawkah musa maliyap ragiyax saku la'li kung na.
S.TRANSL: 好的。我年輕的時候很常上山打獵。
Yes. I used to go hunting in the mountains when I was young.

S.FORM: mahuway su la,tiku pinsaba su sawni ga balayi balay ki.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝，您今天所教導的真是太棒了。
Thank you, what you taught me today was really great.

S.FORM: tiku wayan misu saba' hani ga misi su sinbilan kayi na yayutas rarali', ya'ani balay ku pinyuwan mu sawni.
S.TRANSL: 我所説的都是千真萬確的，祖先所流傳的講述。
All that I say is true, the sayings of my ancestors.

S.FORM: tayhuk runi ku pana'ut misu la,mahuway la pin'azit su pasaba' sawni la.
S.TRANSL: 今天的訪談就到這邊。非常謝謝您的分享。
That's all for today's interview. Thank you very much for sharing with us.

S.FORM: ba'a la, patasala ta sa'utux lawziy ki .
mamawsa kung la ru, sa'utux riyax ga muwa na muwah kung minpung lawziy ka yayuwaw sarali lawziy ki.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，期待下次聽到更多的故事。
I'm going to leave now and look forward to hearing more stories next time.

S.FORM: aw la! tahuway musa la.
lawkah su ga,nanu ku banasun su?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what are you looking for?

S.FORM: pabaziy kung su utux taku.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a cup.

S.FORM: lawkah su ga,nanu ku banasun su?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what are you looking for?

S.FORM: pabaziy kung su utux bubing.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a hat.

S.FORM: pabaziy kung su taku, niya simu matabaziy aw?
S.TRANSL: 我要買杯子，你們有賣嗎?
I want to buy a cup, do you sell them?

S.FORM: kiyan, pisa ku banasun su?
S.TRANSL: Yes, how many do you want to buy?

S.FORM: niya simu tabaziy su pinnang aw?
ungat, ini sami tabaziy na pinnang.
S.TRANSL: No, we don't sell betel nut.

S.FORM: pabaziy kung su buwax.
pisa yubing banasun su?
S.TRANSL: How many packs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: bi'yi kung su tugan yubing.
pabaziy kung su ngahi'.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: wayan su'un tabaziy ku ngahi' hiya la.
S.TRANSL: All the sweet potatoes are sold out.

S.FORM: pabaziy kung su sazing yuyut abura.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two bottles of oil.

S.FORM: utux yuyut balay hara miyan la.
S.TRANSL: We only have one bottle left.

S.FORM: ragiy kung musa mabaziy na batu.
musa pisa tanatin banasun su?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds do you want to buy?

S.FORM: musa pisa tanatin banasun su batu?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds of eggs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: pabaziy kung su sazing tanatin.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two catties.

S.FORM: pabaziy kung su sazing baningan na inuw.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two green onions.

S.FORM: tugan baningan hara ku hani, agan kwara la ki!
S.TRANSL: There are three left, all for you!

S.FORM: pisa pila utux yubing buwax hani?
S.TRANSL: How much is this bag of rice?

S.FORM: utux yubing ga sazing kabahun pila.
sa'unun kwara' ga mpusan utux pila, nuway i mapusan pila' laga asa la.
mahuway su.
hani ga ma'isu pagan magan pila.
pabaziy kung lawziy tikay, patahaki su utux kabahun pila.
S.TRANSL: I'll buy some more, and make up 100 yuan.

S.FORM: yamagan kabahun mapu pila kwara.
hiku su yamagan kabahun pila aw?
lawkah sa'ayung hani hiya la, musa balayi hawiyun tikay aw?
S.TRANSL: 這個太貴了，可以算便宜一點嗎?
It's too expensive, can you make it cheaper?

S.FORM: ayat ba'un yu, payang mahanuk hani la ki.
S.TRANSL: 不行，這個已經很便宜了。
No, this is already very cheap.

S.FORM: galun mu utux yubing pinkan hani.
S.TRANSL: I want this packet of cookies.

S.FORM: pinkan hani ga mtayun pila, pa'agan su yuwaw binah na aw?
S.TRANSL: 這餅乾30元，還需要別的東西嗎?
$30 for the cookies, anything else you need?

S.FORM: musa balayi i kasiyuk kung pila su aw?
S.TRANSL: Can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: ini kung aras pila uziy ki!
yamngiya kung maras su pila la,musa balayi i kasiyuk kung pila su aw?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: laxiy ,tiku kinsyuk su su sarali na pilaini mu naga ini su bi'i na.
S.TRANSL: 不要，上次借的錢你都還沒還我。
No, you haven't paid me back the money you borrowed last time.

S.FORM: musa balayi i kasiyuk kung tikay latan su aw?
aw, haliy magan nanak.
musa balayi kasiyuk kung biru su aw?
wayan mu pakasiyu ki Lawa la.
pakasyuki kung na lilinsa' su wa?
S.TRANSL: 請借給我你的腳踏車好嗎?
Can I borrow your bicycle, please?

S.FORM: aw, sikila ga wahiy mayi lawziy sasan ki.
S.TRANSL: Okay, but you have to give it back to me tomorrow.

S.FORM: niyan mawalax la, ini kung aras su tabakuy, kasiyuki kung tikay tabakuy aw?
S.TRANSL: 下雨了，我沒有帶傘，借我傘好嗎?
It's raining, I don't have an umbrella, can you lend me one?

S.FORM: utux balay ku tabakuy mu, pagalagaw ta amamuk ki!
S.TRANSL: 我只有一把傘，我們一起撐吧!
I only have an umbrella, let's stick together!

S.FORM: biru hani ga kinsiyuk misu su wayan ka sa'utux, pabazih misu la.
S.TRANSL: 這是你上次借我的書，還給你。
This is the book you borrowed from me last time, I give it back to you.

S.FORM: yahani ku pinkasiyuk su kung na biru, ba'anay misu la.
S.TRANSL: 這是你上次借我的書，還給你。
This is the book you borrowed from me last time, I give it back to you.

S.FORM: atu na samawgan su matauax nanu biru na ga, kayan kung lawziy ki.
S.TRANSL: 還想看什麼書都可以跟我說。
You can tell me what else you want to read.

S.FORM: kanuwan ku awsa mu pabzih pila su la?
S.TRANSL: When do I have to pay you back?

S.FORM: nuway iri', kiyan ku luwan su laga pakyalay ta kiya la.
S.TRANSL: 沒關係，你有錢的時候再說。
It's okay, you can talk about it when you have money.

S.FORM: kanuwan ku 'uwah su pabazih pila mu la?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to pay me back?

S.FORM: wahay mu mayi sasan ku pila su.
S.TRANSL: I will return it to you tomorrow.

S.FORM: kanuwan ku 'uwah su pabazih biru mu la?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to return my book?

S.FORM: ayat misu wayan sabay su sahaysa ku biru su la pi?
S.TRANSL: 我昨天不是已經還你了嗎?
Didn't I return it to you yesterday?

S.FORM: ti ku babiru' hani ga pinkasyuk su ni Masaw pi?
S.TRANSL: Did Masaw lend you this pen?

S.FORM: hu, kinsiyuk mu ki hiya su sawni.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I borrowed it from him today.

S.FORM: kinsuyuk su ki Maray ku inpit hani pi?
S.TRANSL: Did you borrow this pen from Maray?

S.FORM: ayat ,banaziy ni yaya mu.
S.TRANSL: No, this is what mom bought.

S.FORM: ungat ku Tamuyux la,usa kasyuk tamuyux ki Sayun.
S.TRANSL: We are out of salt, let's borrow some from Sayun.

S.FORM: aw, halay mu kasiyuk.
hali kamayan i Puyap maha psugi pila mu la.
S.TRANSL: Go tell Puyap to give me my money back.

S.FORM: haliy kamayan i Puyap maha pasiyugi ku pila mu.
S.TRANSL: Go tell Puyap to give me my money back.

S.FORM: pisa ku kuhay niya pila ki isu pi?
S.TRANSL: How much does she owe you?

S.FORM: musa su inu?
musa kung muhi tabihi' i ra'iri'.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to plant vegetables in the garden.

S.FORM: nanu niya su i tawawun?
payux sa'ayun ka'amam la, niyan kung i samriyat ka'amam, kisa laga pasiyan mu siya' la.
S.TRANSL: 草太多了，我在砍草，等一下要澆水。
There's too much grass, I'm cutting it, I'll have to water it later.

S.FORM: ragiy kung tikay magan su sawki ru karuh aw?
S.TRANSL: 幫我把鐮刀和鋤頭拿來好嗎?
Will you get my scythes and hoes, please?

S.FORM: niyan su siyun inu pi?
ki mu siyun i bih na Kawin.
S.TRANSL: Put it next to the plow rake.

S.FORM: tanabun su ku uraw la?
S.TRANSL: Did you turn over the soil?

S.FORM: nisan mu i tanabun, pagahap kung kisa la.
S.TRANSL: 我剛翻過土，等等要播種。
I just turned over the soil, and so on to sow seeds.

S.FORM: ba'un kamiyut ku panuhiy su na tabihi' la?
S.TRANSL: 你種的菜可以收成了嗎?
Are your vegetables ready to be harvested?

S.FORM: musa ba'un kamiyut ku tamana hani hiya la,sina ti ki hasa hiya ga ayat ba'un kamiyut na.
S.TRANSL: 這裡的高麗菜可以收成了，那裡的昭和草就還不能收成。
The cabbage here is ready to be harvested, but the Showa grass there is not yet ready to be harvested.

S.FORM: waw! tiya kinpayux kanuwih su na ngahi'.
S.TRANSL: 哇!你挖了這麼多的地瓜。
(sighs) Wow! You dug up so many gourds.

S.FORM: ragiy kung pinta' i kahu aw?
S.TRANSL: Will you help me with the barn?

S.FORM: nanu ku ki mamu kabalayun?
niya sami pawsa ttara' su siyux.
S.TRANSL: We're releasing fishing nets to catch fish.

S.FORM: payux ku siyux runi aw?
payux siyu laku niyan i pusung hani la.
S.TRANSL: 魚簍裡已經抓了很多魚。
The fish basket has been full of fish.

S.FORM: mutu su maha nanu kamayap su siyux karariyax?
S.TRANSL: How do you usually catch fish?

S.FORM: mutu mu sabing su tawnux samabu su siyux.
S.TRANSL: I shoot fish with a spear.

S.FORM: mutu su sabing bahawni musa i maliyap aw?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to hunt with a bow and arrow?

S.FORM: mutu kung pawsa su ta'uya' tiri' mu sinu, karuma' ga mutu kung maras su patus ru huzin musa maliyap.
S.TRANSL: 我通常都是用陷阱抓獵物，偶爾也會拿槍帶狗狩獵。
I usually catch my prey with a trap, but occasionally I hunt with a gun and a dog.

S.FORM: tu'iy hani ga anwahan na waywak nahi.
S.TRANSL: This is the road the boar took.

S.FORM: uwa su ka ba'un pi?
hani ga pilung kuzih na waywak nahi', misa su tu'i hakayan na waywak nahi' ku hani.
S.TRANSL: 這是山豬的腳印，所以這是山豬所走的路。
These are the footprints of the boar, so this is the path the boar took.

S.FORM: tanahaw ta musa matayux ku ta'uya ta ,asi ga niyan tari'un su asinu la.
S.TRANSL: 快去看我們的陷阱，好像抓到獵物了。
Go and see our trap, for it seems that we have caught our prey.

S.FORM: huwa su ba'un pi?
asi ga wayan sawkan na huzin ku bawyas niya la .hazi ta musa gamalu kiya.
S.TRANSL: 狗好像聞到味道了。我們快跟過去。
The dog seems to have smelled it. Let's follow them.

S.FORM: nanu ku niya su sakalayi su yuwaw hani?
S.TRANSL: 你正在製作的是什麼東西?

S.FORM: hani ga ta'uya na marahan, mutu i tm'atum su awlit.
S.TRANSL: 這是石壓式陷阱，用來抓老鼠的。
This is a stone trap, used to catch rats.

S.FORM: nanu ku niyan su sakuwan sa yuwaw ti hasa hiya?
S.TRANSL: 你放在那裡的是什麼東西?
What is that thing you put there?

S.FORM: hasa ga ta'uya na tiri su kuzih, mutu miyan tiri su para.
S.TRANSL: 那是套腳式繩索陷阱，我們用它來抓山羌。
It was a leg-rigged rope trap, and we used it to catch Shankiang.

S.FORM: mahuway ku liyutux binkis ka mayi su awyat, kiyan ku bani'an ta niya asinu su sawni.
S.TRANSL: 感謝祖靈賜福，今天我們有很多獵物收獲。
Thanks to the blessing of our ancestors, we had a great harvest today.

S.FORM: hu' bayay la, rasaw ta inbalayi amalu' alang ta la ki!
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我們帶回部落好好分享吧!
Yeah! Let's take it back to the tribe and share it!

S.FORM: hu balay la, rasaw ta inbalayi amasu i alang ta ki!
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我們帶回部落好好分享吧!
Yeah! Let's take it back to the tribe and share it!

S.FORM: pasaba'an sami kwara ni pasaba biru sawni ga, nanu sawun kayi Atayan ku lalahuy hiya.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家植物的泰雅語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of plants in Tayal language today.

S.FORM: laxiy abi.
laxiy sanguwa.
laxiy kani na ni'un.
agan ku biru su.
agan ku inpit su.
sakuy ku inpit su.
sakuy ku nani'un su.
ima inpit haniy hiya?
mara mu.
ima biru haniy hiya?
mara ni Tali.
ima i'ing hani hiya?
ini mu ba'iy!
hasa ga latan ni Watan pi?
ayat, hani ga uba ni Puyap.
pasaba biru, ini kung aras biru.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, I didn’t bring my textbook.

S.FORM: pagalu matayux ki bih su galu miru.
S.TRANSL: Share the book with your classmate next to you.

S.FORM: mapahuw ku inpit mu la.
bing murun inpit miru.
wayan mayuwaw ku i'ing mu la.
kasiyukay misu ku i'ing mu.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser.

S.FORM: kamasu ta miru la, pinbaga tu'iy musa su sali ki!
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，回家路上要小心!
It is the end of the class, be careful on your way home.

S.FORM: aw. mahuway su pasaba biru.
kamasu ta miru la, masagaya ta kwara la.
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，大家再見。
The class is over, goodbye everyone.

S.FORM: masagaya ta la pasaba biru.
lawkah simu kwara, lalu mu ga Baysu.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Baysu.

S.FORM: lawkah su Baysu.
lawkah simu kwara, lalu mu ga Tuyaw.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Tuyaw.

S.FORM: lawkah su Tuyaw.
lawkah su, kuzing ga Laysa.
lawkah su Laysa, kuzing ga Kagi.
lawkah su, kuzing ga Pawan.
Buya lawkah su, kuzing ga Payan.
ima su?
kuzing ga yaya ni Pisuy, kuzing ga Sayun.
ima su?
kuzing ga saway kanayrin ni Yupas, lalu mu ga Kagaw.
S.TRANSL: 我是Yupas的妹妹，我的名字是Kagaw。
I am Yupas’s sister. My name is Kagaw.

S.FORM: ima hiya?
hiya ga pasaba biru mu, hiya ga Yumin.
ima ku tayan hasa?
hiya ga basuyan mu tamalung, hiya ga Yuraw.
hiya ga Pihaw pi?
huw, hiya ga Pihaw.
isu ga Piru pi?
ayat, kuzing ga Bawtu.
ima ku Turay?
kuzing ku Turay.
ima ku Kagi?
rawin mu ku Kagi.
nanu lalu ni basuyan su kanayrin?
S.TRANSL: What is your elder sister’s name?

S.FORM: Kumu ku lalu ni basuyan mu kanayrin.
S.TRANSL: My elder sister’s name is Kumu.

S.FORM: ima lalu ni saway su kanayrin?
S.TRANSL: What is your younger sister’s name?

S.FORM: Pisuy lalu ni saway mu kanayrin.
S.TRANSL: My younger sister’s name is Pisuy.

S.FORM: ba'un su lalu niya?
Pasang ku lalu niya.
pisa kayan ni basuyan su tamalung?
S.TRANSL: How old is your elder brother?

S.FORM: mapu magan kayan niya la.
pisa kayan ni saway su tamalung?
S.TRANSL: How old is your younger brother?

S.FORM: magan kayan niya la.
kiya pakaba'an biru i alang mamu?
S.TRANSL: Do you have schools in your community?

S.FORM: kiyan ga.
niya su miru saku pakaba'an biru i alang su?
S.TRANSL: 你在部落的學校讀書嗎?
Do you study in your tribe’s school?

S.FORM: huw ga, isi sami ga utux su sali miru i pakaba'an biru.
S.TRANSL: 是的，在學校讀書我們像一家人。
Yes, we are like family while we are studying at school.

S.FORM: ima ku tamalung hasa?
hiya ga mama mu.
ima ku kanayrin hasa?
hiya ga basuyan mu kanayrin.
ima ku la'i hasa?
hiya ga saway mu tamalung.
nanu ki patawawan ni yaya su?
S.TRANSL: 你的媽媽從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: hiya ga hitay.
nunu ki patawawan ni yaba su?
S.TRANSL: 你的爸爸從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: hiya ga pasaba biru.
hiya ga saway su tamalung?
ayat, hiya ga rawin ni saway mu tamalung.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我弟弟的朋友。
No, he is my younger brother’s friend.

S.FORM: hiya ga basuyan su kanayrin?
ayat, hiya ga saway mu kanayrin.
S.TRANSL: No, she is my younger sister.

S.FORM: pisa kwara hi ku sali naha?
S.TRANSL: How many people in their family?

S.FORM: magan hi kwara ku sali naha.
S.TRANSL: There are five people in their family.

S.FORM: pisa kwara la'i sali mamu?
S.TRANSL: How many children in your family?

S.FORM: payat kwara ku la'i sali miyan.
S.TRANSL: There are four children in our family.

S.FORM: pisa kwara ku saway su?
S.TRANSL: How many younger siblings do you have?

S.FORM: ungat saway mu tamalung, kiyan tugan ku saway mu kanayrin.
S.TRANSL: 我沒有弟弟，有三位妹妹。
I don’t have any younger brothers, but I have three younger sisters.

S.FORM: pisa kwara ku basuyan su?
S.TRANSL: How many older siblings do you have?

S.FORM: ungat ku basuyan mu.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have any older siblings.

S.FORM: pisa kwara ku matasaway su?
S.TRANSL: How many siblings do you have?

S.FORM: ungat ku matasaway mu.
matasaway simu aw?
huw, hiya ga basuyan mu tamalung.
Yencumin simu aw?
huw, Yencumin sami.
hiya ga Atayan uziy pi?
huw, Atayan hiya uziy.
maha nanu kayan sawni?
masakinut kayan yu, kapayux manabuw siya kilux.
S.TRANSL: 天氣有點冷，要多喝熱水。
It’s a bit cold, so you need to drink more warm water.

S.FORM: maha nanu kayan sawni?
makilux kayan yu, kapayux manabuw siya.
S.TRANSL: It’s a bit hot, so you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: maha nanu kayan ti tanux?
rahu witux niya, lungiy ku tasasi su kilux ki.
S.TRANSL: The sun is bright and remember to wear sunscreen.

S.FORM: maha nanu kayan ti tanux?
payux yulung niya, ungat witux ku babaw kayan.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of clouds but no sun in the sky.

S.FORM: pakusa nanu kayan sasan?
musa ungat witux sasan, payux yulung ru rahu ku bayhuy.
S.TRANSL: 明天沒有太陽，雲很多，風很大。
It will be cloudy and windy but not sunny tomorrow.

S.FORM: maha nanu kayan riyax kasa?
S.TRANSL: How was the weather that day?

S.FORM: masakinut riyax hani, palukus su zibun mahatuw su tanux.
S.TRANSL: 這天有點冷，出門要穿外套。
It was a bit cold and you needed to wear a jacket when you went outside.

S.FORM: musa maha nanu kayan hangi'an riyax?
S.TRANSL: How’s the weather on the weekend?

S.FORM: balay kayan ku hangi'an riyax.
S.TRANSL: It will be sunny on the weekend.

S.FORM: musa mawalax kayan riyax kasa?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: balay kayan ku riyax kasa, ayat pawalax.
S.TRANSL: 那天天氣晴朗，不會下雨。
It will have no rain and be sunny that day.

S.FORM: musa mawalax kayan riyax kasa?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: huw, pawalax riyax kasa.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it will be rainy that day.

S.FORM: niya mawalax misu sawni aw?
masiwat la, niya mahatu ku witux la.
S.TRANSL: The rain stops and the sun comes out.

S.FORM: niya mawalax misu sawni?
mawalax la, ini kung aras su tabakuy.
S.TRANSL: It is raining and I don’t have an umbrella with me.

S.FORM: niya mawalax ti tanux?
ini walax misu sawni la, babaw kinriyax la ga musa mawalax, mahatu su tanux ga aras su tabakuy.
S.TRANSL: 現在沒有下雨，中午過後會下雨，出門要帶傘。
It is not raining now, but it will be rainy in the afternoon, so you need to bring an umbrella when you go out.

S.FORM: babaw utux kayan ga musa sakinut ku amisan aw?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very cold in winter next year?

S.FORM: huw, babaw utux kayan amisan ga musa sakinut, kapayux malukus su latan.
S.TRANSL: 是，明年冬天會很冷，要穿很多衣服。
Yes, it will be very cold in winter next year, so you need to put on extra layers.

S.FORM: misu kayan i abagan hani ga musa makilux aw?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very hot in summer this year?

S.FORM: hu, musa makilux ku abagan, kapayux manabuw su siya.
S.TRANSL: 是，夏天會很熱，要多喝水。
Yes, it will be very hot and you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: balay su kayan tamangaw abaw aw?
sagalan mu kayan tamangaw abaw, mali ku kayan niya.
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡春天，天氣很溫暖。
I like spring because the weather is warm.

S.FORM: sagalan su kayan masahu abaw aw?
ini mu sagaliy kayan masahu abaw, mutu payux rahuyan niya.
S.TRANSL: 我不喜歡秋天，秋天有好多颱風。
I don’t like autumn because there are lots of typhoons in autumn.

S.FORM: yangan mu maras biru la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the textbook.

S.FORM: pagaluw kung isu matayux.
S.TRANSL: I will share it with you.

S.FORM: yangan mu maras i'ing la.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the eraser.

S.FORM: kasiyukay misu.
yangan su maras inpit la?
S.TRANSL: Do you forget to bring your pen?

S.FORM: hu, kasiyukiy kung inpit aw?
S.TRANSL: Yes, can you lend me a pen?

S.FORM: nanu ku kariyaxun su?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for lunch?

S.FORM: pakani kung su myenpaw.
nanu ku pakagabiy su?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for dinner?

S.FORM: pakani kung su miyux.
nanu ku wayan su pakanama?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for breakfast?

S.FORM: mamani kung su batu.
nanu ku wayan su kariyaxun?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for lunch?

S.FORM: manani kung su hi wilung.
hata i kinpay'un mari.
usa nama isu halay misu hamkani kisa.
S.TRANSL: 你先去，我等一下去找你。
You go first and I will catch up later.

S.FORM: hata i malangiya.
aw ru! pagalu ta musa.
hata i manaw mari.
laxan mu, halay ta hamakut su biru han.
S.TRANSL: No, we have to carry books first.

S.FORM: gmgarum su ga'anux la?
ini na, niya kung amuwax su piyatu na.
S.TRANSL: Not yet. I am doing the dishes.

S.FORM: tin'uwax su ng'uwa la?
S.TRANSL: Did you rinse out your mouth?

S.FORM: anuwax kung ng'uwa la.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I rinsed out my mouth.

S.FORM: anuwax su piyatu la?
kamasu kung amuwax piyatu la.
huwa su ka ini payma ba?
S.TRANSL: Why didn’t you wash your hands?

S.FORM: papayma kung kisa.
S.TRANSL: I will wash my hands later.

S.FORM: nanu ku niya su patayagun sawni?
S.TRANSL: What were you doing just now?

S.FORM: musa kung hamkani i pasaba biru.
S.TRANSL: I went to meet the teacher.

S.FORM: kamasu su kabaga biru la ga nanu ku yuwaw su la?
S.TRANSL: What are you going to do after school?

S.FORM: musa kung kyuhiy sali la.
kamasu miru la ga nanu ku yuwaw niya la?
S.TRANSL: What is she doing after school?

S.FORM: musa mayugiy hiya la.
S.TRANSL: She is going to go dancing.

S.FORM: Ciwas, niya su sali aw?
hu, haziy kayup sali.
Yuma, niya su sali aw?
ungat sali Yuma yu! kuzing ga Kagaw nanu ku yuwaw su pi? muwah Yuma la ga kiyalaw mu la.
S.TRANSL: Yuma不在家耶!我是Kawgaw，有什麼事嗎?回來我會轉告Yuma。
Yuma is not at home. I am Kawgaw. What can I do for you? I will let him know when he comes back.

S.FORM: ima simu?
yaki, sami ga Yuma ki Iwan, ragiy sami gamiyah su lihun!
S.TRANSL: 奶奶，我們是Yuma和Iwan，幫我們開門!
Grandma, we are Yuma and Iwan, please open the door for us.

S.FORM: ima sa?
kuzing ga Buya, muwah kung hamkani i Pihaw ki.
S.TRANSL: I am Buya, I am here for Pihaw.

S.FORM: basiya su ini uwah la, sanun misu balay la.
S.TRANSL: 你好久沒來了，我好想念你。
You haven’t been here for a long time. I missed you so much.

S.FORM: Laway, muwah kung hamkani isu manaw.
S.TRANSL: Laway, I am here to play with you.

S.FORM: haziy uwah sahuy, basiya misu nawun la.
S.TRANSL: Come on in! I have been waiting for you for a long time.

S.FORM: haniy ga panuhiy mu na ngahi, kani tikay han!
S.TRANSL: 這是我種的地瓜，吃吃看!
This is the sweet potato I grow. Try it!

S.FORM: tiya kinsabing ngahi hani.
S.TRANSL: The sweet potato is so sweet.

S.FORM: inah! haniy ga panuhiy mu na babuway, kani tilay muriy.
S.TRANSL: 過來!這是我種的水果，吃看看。
Come here! These are the fruits I grow. You should try it.

S.FORM: tiya kinsabing ku babuway hani.
tala'ung, hani ga panuhiy mu na tiyay kani tikay muriy!
S.TRANSL: 請坐!這是我種的有機玉米吃看看!
Take a seat! You should try some organic corn that I grow.

S.FORM: um! sabing balay ku tiyay hani.
S.TRANSL: Wow! The corn tastes so sweet.

S.FORM: pakani su yutak aw?
ini kung kani su yutak, mani kung su ringo la ga asa la.
S.TRANSL: 我不能吃橘子，我吃蘋果就好。
I can’t eat oranges. I will have some apples instead.

S.FORM: pakani su pinkan aw?
aw, sagalan mu.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I like it very much.

S.FORM: pata kung su babuway ru kani ki.
S.TRANSL: Let me peel the fruit for you.

S.FORM: mahuway su, payux buw niya ku babuway hani.
S.TRANSL: Thank you. This fruit is so juicy.

S.FORM: bi'ay misu su siya nabuw ki.
S.TRANSL: I will bring you some water.

S.FORM: mahuway su.
kapayux tikay mani, payux ku tanahuk mu na rami.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. I cooked a lot of dishes.

S.FORM: um! balayi balay sawkan ru balay ni'un uziy.
S.TRANSL: Oh! It smells good and looks delicious.

S.FORM: kapayux mani, payux niya hani na.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There is a lot more.

S.FORM: ayat kung pabaga ki!
S.TRANSL: I’ll make myself at home then.

S.FORM: kapayux mani, payux niya hani na.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There are plenty here.

S.FORM: payux waya mu ni'un la, ayat kung pakani la.
S.TRANSL: 我吃了好多，不能再吃了。
I ate a lot and couldn’t eat any more.

S.FORM: rasun simu pasaba biru musa i ragiyax riyax sawni.
S.TRANSL: 老師今天要帶你們去山上。
I will take you to the mountains today.

S.FORM: kamayan ku yaya maha u payux putut i ragiyax.
S.TRANSL: 媽媽說山上有很多蚊子。
Mom says that there are lots of mosquitoes in the mountains.

S.FORM: rasun simu pasaba biru musa i sala riyax sawni.
S.TRANSL: 老師今天要帶你們去田裡。
I will take you to the fields.

S.FORM: musa ta i tamabun uraw aw?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to loosen the soil?

S.FORM: musa ta inu kisa?
rasun ta ni pasaba biru musa i siyaw gawng.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the riverside.

S.FORM: musa ta inu kisa?
rasun ta ni pasaba biru musa i ragiyax.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the mountains today.

S.FORM: musa ta siyaw gawng riyax sawni aw?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the riverside today?

S.FORM: ayat, rasun ta ni pasaba biru musa i ragiyax.
S.TRANSL: 不是，老師要帶我們去山上。
No, our teacher is going to take us to the mountains.

S.FORM: musa ta ragiyax riyax sawni aw?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the mountains today?

S.FORM: ayat, musa ta i sala riyax sawni.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我們今天要去田裡。
No, we are going to the fields.

S.FORM: pasaba biru, nanu ku halan ta matayux siyaw gawng?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到河邊要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see at the riverside?

S.FORM: musa ta matayux layngun.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: pasaba biru, nanu ku halan ta matayux i ragiyax?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到山上要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see in the mountains?

S.FORM: musa ta matayux piray.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see butterflies.

S.FORM: nanu ku halan ta matayuwaw i sala?
S.TRANSL: What are we going to do in the fields?

S.FORM: musa ta matayux panuhiy ta tiyay i sala, pinbaga na tahiy ru banga ki!
S.TRANSL: 我們要到田裡看我們種的玉米，要小心有螞蟻、蜜蜂唷!
We are going to see the corn we grow in the fields, but you need to be aware of the ants and bees.

S.FORM: pasaba biru, musa ta malangiya siyaw gawng aw?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到河邊游泳嗎?
Teacher, are we going to swim in the river?

S.FORM: ayat, musa ta matayux na layngun.
S.TRANSL: No, we are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: pasaba biru, musa ta muhiy tabihi sala aw?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到田裡種菜嗎?
Teacher, are we going to grow some vegetables in the fields?

S.FORM: musa ta tamabun uraw riyax sawni.
S.TRANSL: We are going to loosen the soil today.

S.FORM: kiyan na layngun palaka kiya.
nanak sawni ku mintayux kung su mayanux na layngun.
S.TRANSL: 我今天才看過真正活著的蜻蜓。
Today is the first time I see real living dragonflies.

S.FORM: kiyan piray ku niya palaka kiya.
ye! wa! sagalan mu balay ku piray, tiya kinbaytunux.
S.TRANSL: 耶!哇!我喜歡蝴蝶，很漂亮。
Yeh! Wow! I love butterflies. They are very beautiful.

S.FORM: kiyan piray ku niya palaka kiya.
ayat piray ku hasa, hasa ga banga.
S.TRANSL: Those are not butterflies. They are bees.

S.FORM: yangay ti runi, ka'usa twahiy sa'ayung ki!
S.TRANSL: 在這裡看一看，不要到太遠的地方唷!
Come here and take a look. Don’t go too far!

S.FORM: aw, ayat sami musa twahiy sa'ayung.
S.TRANSL: 好，我們不會去太遠的地方。
Got it, we won’t go anywhere too far.

S.FORM: laxiy i pazinah, tahuway hamakay ba'a su matakuy.
S.TRANSL: 不要用跑的，慢慢走免得跌倒了。
Don’t run and walk slowly lest you fall down.

S.FORM: maha kung naki mu yanga taxan.
S.TRANSL: I want to see them right away.

S.FORM: pakusa su nanu musa i takak?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to the block-house?

S.FORM: papiray kung turaku musa takak.
pananu musa kuysang hiya?
S.TRANSL: How does he go to the hospital?

S.FORM: pahakay musa kuysang hiya.
pananu su musa i Pongxu?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: pagaluw kung kulu palaka musa Pongxu.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by plane.

S.FORM: pananu su musa i Pongxu?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: pagaluw kung asu musa Pongxu.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by boat.

S.FORM: nanu galagan su muwah sali la?
pgaluw kung kisya zik musa sali.
Kagaw pagaluw su nanu musa i pakaba'an biru?
S.TRANSL: How does Kagaw go to school?

S.FORM: pagaluw kisya Kagaw musa pakaba'an biru.
S.TRANSL: Kagaw goes to school by train.

S.FORM: Suyan pagaluw su nanu musa i kyukay?
S.TRANSL: How does Suyan go to church?

S.FORM: pagaluw na lilinsya Suyan musa kyukay.
S.TRANSL: Suyan goes to church by bicycle.

S.FORM: pagaluw su kisya zik musa miru aw?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by MRT?

S.FORM: ayat, pagaluw kung bas musa miru.
S.TRANSL: No, I go to school by bus.

S.FORM: pagaluw su lilinsya musa miru aw?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by bicycle?

S.FORM: hu, pagaluw kung lilinsya musa miru.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to school by bicycle.

S.FORM: pagaluw su kisya haylaw musa Takaw aw?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail?

S.FORM: hu, pagaluw kung kisya haylaw musa Takaw.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail.

S.FORM: musa su i Taytung ga pagaluw su kisya ini ga pagaluw su kulu palaka?
S.TRANSL: 你去台東搭火車還是搭飛機?
Are you going to Taitung by train or by plane?

S.FORM: maluw kung kulu palaka hiya ga, yanga su maluw na kisya hiya.
S.TRANSL: 我搭飛機，搭飛機比搭火車快。
I will take the plane because it is faster than the train.

S.FORM: musa su Kyukay ga pagaluw su bas ka papiray su turaku?
S.TRANSL: 你去教會搭公車還是開車?
Are you going to drive to the church or take the bus?

S.FORM: miray kung turaku musa Kyukay hiya ga, yanga su sagaluw bas hiya.
S.TRANSL: 我開車去教會，開車比搭公車方便。
I will drive to the church because it is more convenient than the bus.

S.FORM: katuwa sawbih ki rahu banasan ku sali su?
S.TRANSL: Is the market close to your house?

S.FORM: ini kasawbih, mutu kung gamaluw su utubay musa rahu banasan.
S.TRANSL: 不近，我都騎摩托車去超市。
No, it is not, so I always ride the motorcycle to the market.

S.FORM: kasawbih kaba'an biru ku sasatuwan su biru aw?
S.TRANSL: Is the post office close to the school?

S.FORM: sawbih ay, hamakay la ga tayhuk la.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it is within walking distance.

S.FORM: sawbih ki nani'an ku nanan bas aw?
S.TRANSL: Is the restaurant close to the station?

S.FORM: mahatu su nanan ru hamakay tikay la ga tayhuk la.
S.TRANSL: 出車站再走五分鐘就到了。
It only takes five minutes after you walk out of the station.

S.FORM: kiyan hari su sawni aw?
huwa la pi?
muwa ni musa kung matisan isu.
S.TRANSL: I would like to visit you.

S.FORM: kiyan yayuwaw mu sawni ini kung akiy sali, sa'utu la ki.
S.TRANSL: 我今天有事不在家，改天吧。
I am out today. How about another day?

S.FORM: kiyan hariy su sasan aw? halay misu hamkaniy babaw kinriyax.
S.TRANSL: 那你明天有空嗎?我下午去找你。
Then, are you available tomorrow? I’ll visit you tomorrow afternoon.

S.FORM: aw ki, naw misu sali.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I will wait for you at home.

S.FORM: ma'ut kung maha musa balay i galay misu su kay aw? galan mu su sasaku na babiru.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄音嗎?我想做紀錄。
Would you mind if I do the voice recording? I would like to keep a record.

S.FORM: aw ru! ungat ya'ih niya.
musa balay magan kung su limu aw?
S.TRANSL: Would you mind if I do the video recording?

S.FORM: ya'ih ku sinrakiyasan mu. ini mu tarayuy uziy ku tawbung mu, lahiy ki.
S.TRANSL: 我不好看，倉庫也沒整理，不要啦。
No, I am plain and the warehouse hasn’t been tidied up yet.

S.FORM: nanu u pasingiy la ga asa la.
S.TRANSL: Then I will just take photos.

S.FORM: lahiy pasiyasing uziy.
mahaway su amalu su su pana'ut.
S.TRANSL: Thank you for accepting the interview.

S.FORM: ungat ya'ih niya, nanu ku sapa'ut su ga pa'ut.
S.TRANSL: You are welcome. What would you like to know?

S.FORM: ma'ut kung su nanu ku yayauwa su saku la'i su?
S.TRANSL: 請問您年輕時是做什麼的?
What do you do when you are young?

S.FORM: salali ga minkung kinsat, hani la ga malax kung la.
S.TRANSL: 我以前是警察，但我現在退休了。
I was a police officer but I am retired now.

S.FORM: nanu u misu hani ga kiyan ki su pamahun aw?
S.TRANSL: Then, are you working at the moment?

S.FORM: niya kung i ma'umah yuwaw pakaba'an biru.
niya kung ma'ut maha u niya maki alang ku lala'i su aw?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的孩子也住在部落嗎?
Do your kids live in the tribe too?

S.FORM: ini, niya maki i uwis kwara lala'i mu.
S.TRANSL: 不，我的孩子在都市居住。
No, my kids are all living in the city.

S.FORM: aw su i utux nanak hi maki sali la?
S.TRANSL: Then, do you live by yourself?

S.FORM: kiyan utux huzin ru utux kabahani mu. utux mu sali laha uziy.
S.TRANSL: 我還有養一隻狗和一隻鳥，他們也是我的家人。
I also keep a dog and a bird. They are my family.

S.FORM: kiyan utux ngiyaw mu uziy, kiya ku yanux psabays ga ini ka'ilang.
S.TRANSL: 我也有養一隻貓，有動物陪伴不會無聊。
I have a cat too. I won’t get bored with the company of my pet.

S.FORM: muwa na ma'ut kung tikay kusa na gaga pasani na maliyap.
S.TRANSL: 我想請問你關於打獵的禁忌。
I would like to ask you about the taboos of hunting.

S.FORM: ini kapayux ku ba'un mu, siki la kiya la ba'un mu ga nanu syukaw misu.
S.TRANSL: 我知道的不多，但我能回答的都會回答你。
I don’t know much about that, but I will tell you everything I know.

S.FORM: kiya la sawun pasani ku babing mamu su ya'aya na aliyap aw?
S.TRANSL: 你們打獵的武器有什麼禁忌嗎?
Do you have any taboos about hunting weapons?

S.FORM: mutu ini babingiy na kanayrin ku ya'aya aliyap miyan hani ki.
S.TRANSL: 我們打獵的武器不可以讓女生碰到。
Our hunting weapons are untouchable to women.

S.FORM: nanu u mutu balay sarasun maliyap ku kanayrin aw?
S.TRANSL: 那女人可以一起去打獵嗎?
Then, can women go hunting together?

S.FORM: ya'ih, mutu ini usa maliyap ku kanayrin hiya.
S.TRANSL: 不行，女人也不可以打獵。
No, women cannot go hunting either.

S.FORM: Yupas, ungat uwaw micyu sali la, usa mabaziy uwaw micyu.
S.TRANSL: Yupas，家裡沒有米酒了，你去買米酒。
Yupas, our home is out of rice wine, please go and buy some.

S.FORM: kiya utux yuyut ki i pahapuyan, ka baziy la.
S.TRANSL: 廚房裡還有一瓶，不用買吧!
There is still one bottle left in the kitchen, so there is no need to buy one!

S.FORM: ini katana utux yuyut, usa mabaziy lawziy su sazing yuyut han.
S.TRANSL: 一瓶不夠，再去買兩瓶回來。
One bottle is not enough for me, go and buy two more back.

S.FORM: pabaziy kung su uwaw miyu, niya simu tabaziy aw?
S.TRANSL: 我要買米酒，你們有賣嗎?
I am looking for rice wine. Do you have any rice wine?

S.FORM: kiyan ay! musa pisa ku banasun su?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How many bottles do you need?

S.FORM: pabaziy kung su sazing yuyut, ru pabaziy kung lawziy su utux yubing buwax.
S.TRANSL: 我要買兩瓶，還要買一包米。
I want two bottles and a pack of rice.

S.FORM: niya haniy ku bawax, kiyan ku banasun su na aw?
S.TRANSL: 米在這裡，你還需要什麼嗎?
Here is the rice, what else do you need?

S.FORM: pabaziy kung su batu na, kiyan simu aw?
S.TRANSL: I want some eggs too, do you have some?

S.FORM: wayan miyan masu'un tabaziy laku batu la.
pabaziy kung su latan.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: musa maha nanu ku kakusa niya pi?
S.TRANSL: What kind of clothes do you like?

S.FORM: pabaziy kung su ra'atung uzit na latan.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.

S.FORM: maha nanu ku matanah haniy hiya ?
kiyan ku natas binah iru na aw?
kiyan ku iru pala'uw ru masingaw iru miyan na.
S.TRANSL: We have white and blue ones too.

S.FORM: bi'iy kung su utux na masingaw iru latan.
S.TRANSL: 請給我一件藍色的衣服。
Please give me the clothes in blue.

S.FORM: Yumin manuwah su inu sawni? nuwah su mayuy ?
S.TRANSL: Yumin你剛剛去哪裡了?你去運動嗎?
Yumin, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

S.FORM: ayat, manuwah kung ramaw tabaziy tabihiy ni yaki mu .
S.TRANSL: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

S.FORM: han , kiyan hari su malahangan aw ? muwah su gamalu kuzing masu'un kagabiy aw!
S.TRANSL: 這樣啊，你晚上有沒有空?要不要和我一起吃飯！
No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?

S.FORM: ayat yu , musa kuzing mabaziy su latan.
S.TRANSL: No, I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: nanu u, hala kung gamaluw isu.
S.TRANSL: Then, I will go with you.

S.FORM: lawkah su ga, pa'usay misu pisa pila ku utux bahun tabihi hani?
S.TRANSL: 你好，請問這把菜多少錢?
Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?

S.FORM: utux bahun tabihi hani ga mapusan pila.
S.TRANSL: The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.

S.FORM: pisa pila ku ngahi hani?
S.TRANSL: How much are these sweet potatoes?

S.FORM: utux tanatin ngahi hani ga matayun pila.
S.TRANSL: Sweet potatoes are thirty dollars for a pound.

S.FORM: bi'iy kung su sazing bahun tabihi ru utux tanatin ngahi.
S.TRANSL: 請給我兩把菜和一斤地瓜。
Please give me two bunches of vegetables and a pound of sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: Pitu, yangan mu maras inpit, musa su pakasiyuk kuzing aw?
S.TRANSL: Pitu，我忘了帶筆，你可以借我嗎?
Pitu, I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?

S.FORM: ungat kung uziy, hani ga mara ni Payan.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have one either. This is Payan’s.

S.FORM: nanu kasyukay ta tikay han aw? yanga misu bi'an.
S.TRANSL: 那可以借我一下子嗎?我很快就還你。
Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.

S.FORM: aw, agan.
mahuway su, mahuway su kusa Payan uziy ki.
S.TRANSL: Thank you and thank Payan for me.

S.FORM: nanu ku sawun su?
muwah kung pabaziy sazing biru haniy.
S.TRANSL: I want to return these two books.

S.FORM: aw ki, nanu lawziy ku galun su?
S.TRANSL: No problem and what else do you need?

S.FORM: pakasiyuk kung lawziy tugan biru .
S.TRANSL: I would like to borrow these three books.

S.FORM: asa la. lungi su tugan riyax laga wahiy may la ki.
S.TRANSL: 好了。記得三天後要拿來還。
Sure and remember to return them after three days.

S.FORM: ini su bi'iy kung ku i'ing mu na.
S.TRANSL: You haven’t returned me the eraser.

S.FORM: wayan misu bi'an saku sahaysa la
nanu huwa ka ini luy ku i'ing mu la.
S.TRANSL: 那我的橡皮擦怎麼不見了。
Then, why is my eraser missing?

S.FORM: ini su wayan pakasyuki ni Yayut pi.
S.TRANSL: Did you lend it to Yayut?

S.FORM: ini mu ba'iy, halay mu ma'ut hiya.
S.TRANSL: I don’t know. I will go and ask her.

S.FORM: namaw misu kasiyuk ku i'ing mu han.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser first.

S.FORM: Siwat, kinsyukan su ki Baysu ku latan haniy?
S.TRANSL: Siwat, did Siwat lend you this coat?

S.FORM: ayat, hani ga banaziy kung ni yaya mu ki.
S.TRANSL: 不是，這是我媽媽買給我的。
No, my mom bought it for me.

S.FORM: matana ki isu ku latan uba ni Watan.
S.TRANSL: Watan’s coat is the same as yours.

S.FORM: uba niya ga makalux iruw hiya, ini patana ki sami ku iruw niya.
S.TRANSL: 他的外套是黑色的，我們的顏色不一樣。
His coat is black, so our colors are different.

S.FORM: Simuy, kinsiyuk su pila ni Tahus aw?
S.TRANSL: Simuy, did you borrow money from Tahus?

S.FORM: hu, naki sawni ku awsa mu may hiya, yangan mu maras su pila la.
S.TRANSL: 有，我本來今天要還他，我忘記帶錢了。
Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.

S.FORM: nanu u kanuwaw ku usa su pabazih hiya ?
S.TRANSL: Then, when will you return the money?

S.FORM: halan mu may sasan la.
S.TRANSL: I will return to him tomorrow.

S.FORM: aw, ragay misa kamayan Tahus.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I will tell Okay, I will tell for you. for you.

S.FORM: awlit ga isi ki ta'uya su marahan ta'atum, pakuhiy ga isi ki talangan su tiri awlu, ya'ani ku ini patakari.
S.TRANSL: 老鼠應該要⽤⽯壓式陷阱抓，⽵雞應該要⽤套頸式陷阱抓，這樣才對。
It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

S.FORM: aw sawun kaniy, niya mu takariyun la, misa su mutu kung ini tiri.
S.TRANSL: 原來是這樣，我都搞錯了，難怪我都抓不到。

S.FORM: nanu u pasaba'ay misu sazing taya'an ru sawun nanu pawsa su ta'uya.
S.TRANSL: 那我再教你怎麼製作這兩種陷阱。
Then I will teach you how to set up these two traps.

S.FORM: aw ru! ya'asa balay! ya'ani la ga suru niya musa kung tiri su sinuw uziy la.
S.TRANSL: 好啊！太棒了！這樣我以後就會抓到獵物了。
Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

S.FORM: ruyux ku ka'aman sala la, haliy magan ki kahu na sawki, hala ta i sala.
S.TRANSL: 田裡的草太長了，你去倉庫拿鐮刀，我們去田裡。
The grass in the fields is too tall. Go to the warehouse to take the sickle and let’s go to the fields.

S.FORM: ki siyun inu ku sawki?
ki siyaw na kahu ku luku , mayup su kahu laga taxan su la.
S.TRANSL: 在圓簍的旁邊，你進去倉庫就會看到了。
It is next to the round basket. You will see it when you enter the warehouse.

S.FORM: pinbaga magan, laxiy agan pangih, hingu ku sawki.
S.TRANSL: 小心拿，不要受傷，鐮刀很利。
Be careful and don’t get hurt. The sickle is very sharp.

S.FORM: laxiy i pa'aliy ku ta'uya mu ki!
ki inu ku ta'uya su?
ki i yahu na kahawni hasa ku ta'uya mu.
S.TRANSL: 我的陷阱在那棵樹的下面。
My trap is under that tree.

S.FORM: huwa su ba'un lmngalung?
niyan mu siyun su turing, ku runi , ba'un mu kiy inu ku ta'uya mu.
S.TRANSL: 我在這邊有做記號，我知道我的陷阱在哪裡。
I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

S.FORM: hani ga saguyu, saguyu miyan siyux i siyaw na gawng.
S.TRANSL: 這是魚筌，我們放在溪邊捕魚。
This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

S.FORM: ungat ku saguyu miyan hasa hiya, mutu sami isi panayp magan siyux.
S.TRANSL: 我們那邊沒有魚筌，我們都用釣竿抓魚。
We don’t have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

S.FORM: ayat kung nabing su bawli nayp na, pasaba'iy kung sautux aw?
S.TRANSL: 我沒有用過釣竿，你下次教我好嗎?
I have never used a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?

S.FORM: aw yu ! pagaluw ta sa'utux musa panayp
S.TRANSL: 好啊!我們下次一起去釣魚。
Sure! Let’s go fishing together next time.

S.FORM: nanu u pasaba'ay misu tamuni su saguyu sa'utux.
S.TRANSL: I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

S.FORM: niya maha tari tari ku nayp su la, ini ka niya tiri su siyux, haziy i haliy pasakalu.
S.TRANSL: 你的釣竿動了，是不是有魚上鉤了，你快拉起來。
Your fishing rod is moving. Isn’t the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

S.FORM: na tikay, maylay sa'ayung ku asu, niya kung ti hani pasakaluw nayp, haliy kung ramaw magan su tahung aras runi . aw
S.TRANSL: 等等，船太晃了，我在這邊拉釣竿，你去那邊幫我拿網子來。
Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

S.FORM: sakalagiy isu ku siyux pakura ki kuzing, ragay misu pasakalu.
S.TRANSL: 你把魚拉到我這邊，我幫妳拉起來。
Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up.

S.FORM: tiya kinbalay! payux ku anagan ta , sapun siyax kwara ku yawa la.
S.TRANSL: 太好了!今天大豐收，魚簍都裝滿了。
Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

S.FORM: tila la, halay ta amasu kwara galuw ta.
S.TRANSL: 我們快回去和大家分享。
Let’s go back immediately and share it with everyone.

S.FORM: niyan psba biru la.
laxiy gnaw la, ihiy tl'ung tlngan.
S.TRANSL: 不要再玩了，快坐在座位上。
Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

S.FORM: swali, kung ksu'iy kung la.
ihiy uwah sahuy.
soni ga te pisa ryax?
soni ga te magan ryax, sasan ga phngi, hata mgluw musa mgnaw.
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧。
It’s Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let’s go out and play together!

S.FORM: aw! hata syaw llyung.
S.TRANSL: Great! Let’s go to the riverside.

S.FORM: te pisa ryax sasan la?
S.TRANSL: What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: sasan ga te tugan ryax, hata tmpak mari 'lyan sasan ki!
S.TRANSL: 明天星期三，我們明天下午去玩球吧!
Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let’s go play ball tomorrow afternoon!

S.FORM: nanu yaw su mgyebu sasan?
S.TRANSL: What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

S.FORM: sasan ga ryax rehay, pgluw kung yaya musa kyokay.
S.TRANSL: 明天是星期日，我要和媽媽去教會。
Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.

S.FORM: su nanu la?
kputa kung, mmosa kung pstiyan.
S.TRANSL: I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: cyaki mtkgin tunux mu.
isu ga psromun mhngi han.
psba biru, mxayan nbuwas mu, musa kung pstiyan.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我肚子痛，要去廁所。
Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: aw, ihiy usa.
lay kung musa mema 'ba?
S.TRANSL: May I go wash my hands?

S.FORM: sobih ta phngi la, naga cikay ru usa la.
S.TRANSL: It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: psba biru, mxayan balay tunux mu, phngi kung 'lyan.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我頭好痛，下午要請假。
It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: aw, pinbaga nanak musa sali.
S.TRANSL: Okay, take care and go home.

S.FORM: psba biru, babaw rehay te utux ryax ga phngi kung, mmosa kung ptayux kuysang.
S.TRANSL: 老師我下禮拜一要請假，我要去看醫生。
Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.

S.FORM: aw, nblay mlahang hi.
ki inu Sayun?
mxayan nbuwas nya, ki pstiyan.
S.TRANSL: She has a stomachache. She’s in the restroom.

S.FORM: ki inu Hayung?
psba biru mxayan olu ni Hayung, phngi hiya kisa.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, Hayung has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

S.FORM: huwa ka ini uwah Sayun?
ki mkiluh tunux nya la.
kelaniy cikay isu nanak han.
lalu mu ga Walis Pihaw, mpuw kayan mu la.
S.TRANSL: My name is Walis Pihaw, and I’m 10 years old.

S.FORM: ima lalu su?
lalu mu ga Walis Pihaw.
la'i su na nanu zok?
S.TRANSL: What ethnic group are you from?

S.FORM: kuzing ga la'i Tayan.
Gyenzyumin kwara utux sali mamu?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: hu, Tayan sami kwara utux sali.
S.TRANSL: 是的，我們全家都是泰雅族人。
Yes, my whole family is Atayal.

S.FORM: Gyenzyumin kwara utux sali mamu?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: 'yat, yaba mu ga Tayan, yaya mu ga sehu.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我的爸爸是泰雅族，我的媽媽是漢人。
No, my father is Atayal, and my mother is Han Taiwanese.

S.FORM: la'i su ni ima?
la'i kung ni Maray Kumay.
hiya ga yaba su? pisa kayan nya la?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: hu, hiya ga yaba mu, mt'yu pgan kayan nya la.
S.TRANSL: 是的，他是我爸爸，六十歲了。

S.FORM: hasa ga yaba su? pisa kayan nya la?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: 'yat, hiya ga nbkis alang myan, mspat pgan kayan nya la.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我們部落的耆老，他80歲了。
No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

S.FORM: pisa kayan bsuyan su tmalung la?
mpuw mspat kayan bsuyan mu tmalung la.
twahiy hinnari kayan mamu ki bsuyan su tmalung?
S.TRANSL: 你哥哥年紀比你大很多嗎?
Is your brother much older than you?

S.FORM: magan kayan hinnari myan.
pisa kinwawi su?
kbhun mspatun kungbun kinwawi mu.
bsya ta ini pktayux la, wayan su tmwang kinwawai lrwa?
S.TRANSL: 好久不見，你是不是長高了?
I haven’t seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

S.FORM: hu yu, kbhun mtyun kungbun kinwawi mu la.
wayan su kthuy lrwa?
ini ay, tkari su tayux la.
mhikang su la?
ini ki, wayan kung kthuy la.
kthuy su la?
hu, mtyun kungcin kung misu soni la.
mmosa su inu?
mmosa kung ptyawgan psba biru hkangi psba biru.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to the office to see the teacher.

S.FORM: mmosa inu Watan?
mmosa pbuling syup ku hiya.
S.TRANSL: He’s going to throw away the trash.

S.FORM: ki inu ku Watan?
ki pitung plngyan, mmosa pspung mlngya kisa ku hiya.
S.TRANSL: 他在游泳池，他等一下要比賽游泳。
He’s at the swimming pool. He’s going to compete in a swimming competition later.

S.FORM: ki inu ku Tapas? mmosa pspung mzinah kisa ku hiya.
S.TRANSL: Tapas在哪裡?她等一下要比賽跑步。
Where is Tapas? She’s going to compete in a running competition later.

S.FORM: ki plhuyan, halay mu smuy.
S.TRANSL: She’s in the auditorium. I’ll go call her.

S.FORM: pgluw ta musa pgnahan.
S.TRANSL: Let’s go to the playground together.

S.FORM: hala kung mbaziy kryaxun mu han, halay misu hkangi kisa.
S.TRANSL: 我先去買午餐，等一下去找你。
I’ll go buy lunch first, and then I’ll meet you later.

S.FORM: hata mgluw lmeli magan bento ki!
S.TRANSL: Let’s carry the lunch boxes together!

S.FORM: hkangi binah, mmosa kung hkangi psba biru.
S.TRANSL: 你找別人，我要去找老師。
You find someone else, I’m going to find the teacher.

S.FORM: mmosa pspung tmuting rmuru mari ku Lahuy kisa?
S.TRANSL: Is Kacaw competing in croquet today?

S.FORM: 'yat, mmosa pspung mntazin hminas rruma.
S.TRANSL: No, he’s competing in high jump.

S.FORM: ryax na onrokay ga musa su pspung?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: hu ay, pspung kung mzinah.
ryax na onrokay ga mmosa su pspung?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: mosa kung pspung tmuting rmuru mari.
nanu pspngan ta ryax onrokay?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會那天要做甚麼?
What will we do in the sports day?

S.FORM: pspung ta mgluw hmuluy kthuy snyuw.
S.TRANSL: We will compete in tug of war.

S.FORM: mmosa ta tbaziy nni'un i onrokay?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會要賣食物嗎?
Will we sell food at the sports day?

S.FORM: 'yat, tbaziy ta bubun.
cyakin lokah su, isu wayan magan pyang gleng!
S.TRANSL: 你獲得了第一名耶，真是厲害！
Congratulations on getting first place! You’re amazing!

S.FORM: mhuway su.
niya sali yaki?
hu, ki m'abi 'byan.
S.TRANSL: Yes, she’s sleeping in her room.

S.FORM: ki sali yaki?
ungat, nisan wayan tetanux, mmwah sali gbyan.
S.TRANSL: 不在，她剛出去了，要晚上才回家。
No, she’s not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

S.FORM: niya sali yutas?
ki yatux, hali hkangi kya.
S.TRANSL: 他在樓上，你上去找他吧。
He’s upstairs. You can go up and find him.

S.FORM: kyan tayan niya mki sali?
Temu ga, bsya ini txiy la, lokah su ga?
S.TRANSL: 是Temu阿，很久沒有看到你了，你好嗎?
It’s Temu. I haven’t seen you in a while! How have you been?

S.FORM: lokah ay! muwah kung mcisan isu.
S.TRANSL: I’m doing great! I came to chat with you.

S.FORM: niya inu yaba su?
ki pksyus rami tobuy, halay mu smuy.
S.TRANSL: 他在廚房炒菜，我去叫他。
He’s in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.

S.FORM: wayan inu Pitay la?
wayan kmyap wilung sku libu wilung ku hiya la.
S.TRANSL: She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

S.FORM: yutas, niyan sami la.
ini kaki sali yutas mamu, ki mki s'la, kki sali mnaga hiya.
S.TRANSL: 你們的爺爺不在家，他在田裡，你們在家等他回來吧。
Your grandfather is not at home. He’s in the field. Wait for him to come back.

S.FORM: mama niyan su la!
bsya ta ini pktayux, rahu ru wawi su la.
S.TRANSL: I haven’t seen you in a while. You’ve grown taller.

S.FORM: txan mu niyan su ga m'as balay inlungan mu.
S.TRANSL: It’s so good to see you.

S.FORM: phngaran hani ga bbay simu , posa sahuy tenpinsyang.
S.TRANSL: 這是給你們的鳳梨，要放到冰箱裡。
Here’s a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

S.FORM: bsya su ini uwah, kyalaw mu kwara pgluw ta mlaw mani.
S.TRANSL: 這麼久沒來，我叫大家一起來吃飯。
It’s been a while. Let’s have a meal together.

S.FORM: nuway la, 'si ta nbu s'ha, hata mpcisan n_gan lpiyung.
S.TRANSL: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。
No need to bother. I’ll just have tea. Let’s sit in the living room and chat.

S.FORM: mhuway innagan su, mmosa kung sali la.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝你的招待，我要回家了。
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

S.FORM: nisan buwakun ku wilung hani, rasi sali thhway mani.
S.TRANSL: 這隻雞剛殺好，你帶回家慢慢吃。
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

S.FORM: babaw kinryax sasan ga, pktayux ta aw?
S.TRANSL: 我和您約明天下午好嗎?
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?

S.FORM: aw, pktayux ta inu?
pktayux ta pkba'an biru aw? nki ta galan syasing beromo.
S.TRANSL: 我們約學校好嗎?我們要錄影。
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

S.FORM: nanu hata pslyan, pklatan kung latan Tayan.
S.TRANSL: 那去聚會所好了，我會穿族服去。
Then let’s go to the community center. I’ll wear folk costume.

S.FORM: memaw blay txan kwara kaka na sakura alang myan. mkaka lga wahi kung mcisan!
S.TRANSL: 我們部落的櫻花盛開很漂亮。等花開的時候你來找我吧!
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!

S.FORM: aw n_gon tmangu abaw na, bsya s'yung la.
S.TRANSL: 那要等到春天，太晚了吧!
That would have to wait until spring. It’s too late, isn’t it?

S.FORM: nanu uwah i psyurak!
S.TRANSL: 那你祖靈祭的時候來吧!

S.FORM: hu rwa! 'si mu n_gay balay!
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’m looking forward to it!

S.FORM: huwa su ka pbinah alang myanux?
S.TRANSL: 請問你為甚麼要搬回部落生活?
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?

S.FORM: mmosa kung psba biru.
S.TRANSL: I want to return to teach at the local school.

S.FORM: huwa su ini 'ki heci psba biru?
S.TRANSL: Why not teach in the city?

S.FORM: ye'igi snun mu alang mu, ru nki kung muwah smyuk rmaw alang uzi.
S.TRANSL: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，也希望能回饋部落。
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

S.FORM: ba su balay tminun, ima cinba isu?
S.TRANSL: 你很會織布，是誰教你的?
You’re very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

S.FORM: yaki mu, hiya ga pyang ba tminun alang myan.
S.TRANSL: 是我的奶奶，她是我們部落最會織布的人。
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.

S.FORM: huwa su ka nki smogan mkbaga tminun?
S.TRANSL: How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

S.FORM: tminun ga gaga ta, lngalung kung maha musa psluhing gaga.
S.TRANSL: 織布是我們的文化，我想要讓文化延續。
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

S.FORM: cyakin lay nubun balay uwaw tayan.
inbgan mu nanak ga!
cyakin ba su, bsya 'bgan?
S.TRANSL: 你真厲害，這要釀很久嗎?
You’re really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

S.FORM: ini, kyala utux rehay lga blay la. sbihan tmahuk ku rhkay ru buwax han, twangan posa kuna ru nble'un p'imaw lga blay t'zyun sahuy hlaman la.
S.TRANSL: 不用，大約一周就好了。把糯米和白米先蒸熟，再加入麴粉一起拌勻，就可以裝到甕裡了。
No, it only takes about a week. After steaming the sticky rice and white rice, we mix it with yeast powder, and then it can be stored in a jar.

S.FORM: nenanu niya su stbaziy?
meluh ru inu tayan, pinmuhi mu nanak.
S.TRANSL: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔!
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

S.FORM: bnasun mu sazing hani ga pisa pila?
sazing kbhun ru mziman kwara.
sgalan mu latan hani, pisa pila?
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢?
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?

S.FORM: magan kbhun.
lokah s'yung la, ya'ih khnuk cikay?
S.TRANSL: It’s too expensive. Can’t you lower the price a bit?

S.FORM: 'yat ki, mhuy lga musa kung akazi la.
S.TRANSL: No, if I lower it further, I’ll lose money.

S.FORM: aw la! bnasaw mu utux mkaluh latan.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!那我要一件黑色的衣服。
Alright then, I’ll take a black piece of clothing.

S.FORM: bnasun mu kut hani ru tapa hani.
S.TRANSL: 我要這把刀和這個鍋子。
I want this knife and this pot.

S.FORM: sazing syan kwara, kinblay mu nanak, ana bsya ga 'yat phiri.
S.TRANSL: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，保證可以用很久。
It’s a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

S.FORM: niya mu rasun rawin mu muwah mbaziy , blay khnuk cikay?
S.TRANSL: 我介紹朋友來買，可以再便宜一些嗎?
I’ll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?

S.FORM: aw la! khuy mu mpusan posn.
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’ll give you a 20% discount.

S.FORM: uwah tayux cikay! ana latan busi ga kyan.
S.TRANSL: 來看看喔!衣服帽子都有賣。
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

S.FORM: pisa pila latan hiya?
utux latan ga tugan kbhun mziman, tugan latan lga utux syan.
S.TRANSL: One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

S.FORM: pbaziy kung utux nanak, ita ku g'anus.
S.TRANSL: 我買一件就好，請給我新的。
I’ll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

S.FORM: lokah su, pbaziy kung sumun ru lnlugan ma'aw na syam.
S.TRANSL: 你好，我想要買糯米飯和山胡椒滷肉。
Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.

S.FORM: ungat sumun hiya la, kyan ku plgan tana na kuna, pbaziy su?
S.TRANSL: 飯賣完了。我還有刺蔥油餅，你要買嗎?
The rice is sold out. I have tana pancakes, would you like to buy them?

S.FORM: aw la, bi'iy kung utux, waha kung s'utux mbaziy ku sumun hiya la.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!請給我一份，我下次再來買飯。
Alright, please give me one. I’ll come back next time to buy rice.

S.FORM: aw skuyaw mu na kapa, hani ga mziman.
S.TRANSL: W：好，我幫你用袋子裝起來，這樣50元。
Okay, I’ll pack it in a bag for you. That’ll be 50 dollars.
